statements: UPDATE courses SET location='Room A', schedule_time='2022-10-20 14:00:00' WHERE course_id=101;

UPDATE courses SET instructor='John Doe', students=25 WHERE course_id=101;
UPDATE announcements SET announcement_text='New announcement for students', created_at='2022-12-25 08:00:00' WHERE announcement_id=201;
UPDATE courses SET instructor = 'John Doe', students = 50 WHERE course_id = 101
UPDATE announcements SET announcement_text = 'New announcement for the upcoming exam', created_at = '2022-10-15 15:00:00' WHERE announcement_id = 201
UPDATE courses SET course_description = 'Updated course description' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET student_major = 'Computer Science', enrollment_status = true WHERE student_id = 2;
